risk_factors.description: Open Wi-Fi networks without proper authentication
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement WPA3 security protocol and strong authentication

risk_factors.description: Flat network architecture without proper segmentation
risk_factors.mitigation: Segment the network into VLANs and implement firewalls

recommendations: Secure wireless networks with strong encryption
Implement network segmentation to limit lateral movement

risk_factors.description: Critical core switches without up-to-date firmware
risk_factors.mitigation: Regularly apply security patches to core switches

risk_factors.description: Lack of real-time network monitoring and intrusion detection
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement robust network monitoring and intrusion prevention systems

recommendations: Schedule regular firmware updates for core switches
Deploy intrusion detection systems for continuous monitoring

risk_factors.description: Obsolete firewall rules that do not align with current requirements
risk_factors.mitigation: Regularly review and update firewall rules

risk_factors.description: Lack of physical access controls for network equipment
risk_factors.mitigation: Enhance physical security measures for networking devices

recommendations: Perform a firewall rule audit and cleanup
Implement better physical access controls for networking equipment

risk_factors.description: Sensitive data transmitted over unencrypted channels
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement VPNs or encrypted communication protocols

risk_factors.description: Weak authentication and authorization for remote access
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement strong authentication mechanisms and access controls

recommendations: Deploy VPN solutions for secure remote data transmission
Enhance remote access security with multi-factor authentication

risk_factors.description: Devices connecting to the network without proper authentication
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement device authentication and network access control

risk_factors.description: Single points of failure without network redundancy
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement redundant network paths and failover mechanisms

recommendations: Enforce device authentication before network access
Design and implement network redundancy for critical systems

risk_factors.description: Unsecured personal devices accessing the network
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement a separate network for guest and BYOD devices

risk_factors.description: Limited monitoring of network traffic and activities
risk_factors.mitigation: Deploy network monitoring tools for better visibility

recommendations: Implement a segmented network for guest and personal devices
Enhance network monitoring capabilities to detect anomalies

risk_factors.description: Sensitive financial data transferred without encryption
risk_factors.mitigation: Enable SSL/TLS for all data transfers

risk_factors.description: Unauthorized access by internal personnel
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement strict access controls and user monitoring

recommendations: Encrypt all financial data transfers using SSL/TLS
Implement user behavior monitoring for early detection of insider threats

risk_factors.description: Insecurely configured medical devices connected to the network
risk_factors.mitigation: Apply security patches and segment medical devices

risk_factors.description: Potential exposure of patient health records
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement strict access controls and data encryption

recommendations: Regularly update and secure medical device configurations
Implement encryption for all patient health records

risk_factors.description: Unmanaged and potentially vulnerable IoT devices
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement network segmentation and IoT device monitoring

risk_factors.description: Potential loss of proprietary research data
risk_factors.mitigation: Enhance data access controls and encryption

recommendations: Isolate IoT devices from critical research networks
Implement advanced data access controls and encryption

risk_factors.description: Potential targeted cyber attacks from nation-state actors
risk_factors.mitigation: Implement advanced threat detection and incident response

risk_factors.description: Lack of redundancy and disaster recovery mechanisms
risk_factors.mitigation: Enhance network resilience and disaster recovery plans

recommendations: Implement specialized threat detection mechanisms for advanced threats
Develop and test comprehensive disaster recovery strategies
